description: PersistentVolumeClaimVolumeSource represents a reference to a PersistentVolumeClaim in the same namespace

ClaimName.description: ClaimName is the name of a PersistentVolumeClaim in the same namespace as the pod using this volume

ReadOnly.description: Optional: Defaults to false (read/write).  ReadOnly here will force the ReadOnly setting in VolumeMounts
